CustomField.description:
Total count of quotes lost in the past 30 days . This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_Lost_Last_30_Days__c
Criteria for lost quotes is stage changed to lost - today <=30.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of quotes lost in the last 30 days for related accounts.
CustomField.label: Quotes Lost Last 30 Days
